description:
NanoAccu is the upgraded version of our NanoOne microspectrophotometer, designed to meet higher performance demands in molecular biology and microbiology research.
NanoAccu also features automatic calibration for reliable results—users can follow simple on-screen instructions to complete the calibration. High repeatability, high stability, and optional multi-level user access control make it an ideal all-in-one microspectrophotometer for advanced research labs.

Features:
• New intuitive UI, with easy navigation and more measurement methods
• Custom mode can improve measure time based on sample concentration range 
• Broader absorbance range up to 750 Abs, 5 path lengths enabling accurate detection of higher concentration samples
• OD600 cuvette with stirring and heating functions, ideal for microbial growth kinetics studies
• Option for Three-level Audit trail & Contamination analysis(optional), helping ensure sample purity
• Long life’s Xenon flash lamp.
• Only 0.5～2μl sample volume requested, which can be recycled after test, ideal for precious samples. 
• Built-in printer.
• Measurement result can be exported to U disk in format of Excel, JPG. MaxMed UAE is the leading supplier of Microspectrophotometer in Dubai and across the United Arab Emirates. We provide professional Microspectrophotometer with same-day quotes, fast delivery, installation support, and comprehensive after-sales service. Contact us at +971 55 460 2500 for expert consultation and competitive pricing.
